CustomField.description: Used for the create record dropdown menu. Should use utility SLDS icons. See lightningdesignsystem.com/icons. Format 'category:icon'.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used for the create record dropdown menu. Should use utility SLDS icons. See lightningdesignsystem.com/icons. Format 'category:icon'.
CustomField.label: Dropdown Icon (SLDS)
